link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 专辑艺术家的选择
  2. 改进 支持搜索流派
  3. 改进 初始搜索标签页与当前标签页同步
  4. 改进 略微加快搜索响应速度
  5. 移除 启动时的歌曲验证和标记 (2023 年首次于 v1.3.1 引入)
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: picking of the album artist
  2. Improve: support genres search
  3. Improve: sync initial search tab with the current tab
  4. Improve: slightly accelerate response of searching
  5. Remove: queue validating and marking at start up (first introduced in v1.3.1 in 2023)

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 异常 Monet 颜色 (v1.11.3 起存在)
  2. 修复 非自动主题下，部分对话框文本颜色反转
  3. 改进 支持重置文件过滤器设置
  4. 新增 添加“扫描媒体”快捷方式，若无内容可显示
  5. 开发 使用 JDK 21 构建
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: glitchy Monet colors (since v1.11.3)
  2. Fix: inverted text color on some dialogs in non-auto theme
  3. Improve: support resetting Path Filter settings
  4. New: add the shortcut of 'Scan Media' if no items to display
  5. Development: build with JDK 21

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK (File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 新增 支持编辑多艺术家与多流派的分隔符
  2. 改进 切换 'Music Library Provider' 模式后无需重启
releaseNote.en:
1. New: support editing separators for tags of multiple artists and genres
  2. Improve: there is no need to reboot after switching 'Music Library Provider' mode
